item.description:
Product: Data Analaysis Template v1.0.7.2

Release Date: Wed, 06 Jul 2022 16:31:20 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Template for building data analysis programs

Release Notes: [1.0.7]

- Load data with LV-Data:Read.vi
- Waves/channels loaded by name
- Capability to list and load folders
- Updated dependencies

item.title: XY Utilities v1.5.1.1
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.5.1.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 06 Jul 2022 12:06:21 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square, Log
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Restrict X Range, Remove Outliers
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize
- <b>Filters</b>: Zero Phase Low Pass, Savitsky-Golay,
- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: New Methods
- Savitsky Golay Weighted filters

Changes
- Update palette
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: XY Utilities v1.5.0.1
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.5.0.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 30 Jun 2022 10:43:31 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square, Log
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Restrict X Range, Remove Outliers
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize
- <b>Filters</b>: Zero Phase Low Pass, Savitsky-Golay,
- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: **Build with LV2019**

New Methods
- Log.vi (user selects natural log or base 10 log)

Changes
- New algoithm for interpolation with expnded boundaries (x200 faster)
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data v3.4.0.1
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.4.0.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 27 Jun 2022 14:01:48 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read TDMS, Igor Text Files (*.itx), text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat), postgreSQL. Tools are also provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3.

Release Notes: [3.4.0]
- Issue #90:
- Add support for Maps (Convert Dictionary to Map)
- Add methods for getting Keys and Values from Dictionaries or Maps
- Variant to Data methods are publicly scoped
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.2.2
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.2.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Sat, 18 Jun 2022 20:02:57 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: - This release should fix a long-standing issue in which there would be a phase shift when Fs/#s /= integer multiple of f_REF
- Issue #61: Fix issues with sweep buffer
- Issue #62: Fix device enumeration

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013 (32 bit / x86)](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.7.6
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.7.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 14 Jun 2022 00:01:51 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: - Update to Instrument Framework v1.12.1
